name: A Car that Crares
description:
Play the game in fullscreen mode for best experience. This town needs you!

Being cooped up in your home can be cozy and scary at the same time. It's hard to respect social distancing when you need to take care of yourself and others! That's why we started A Car that Cares, a charity that delivers food care packages to those in need across town. We deliver to all types of people, whether you're young or old, in need or not, or just need a boost!

The game :
  • Manage your care packages in a timely manner to deliver as much as you can.
  • Unlock a reward each day!
Made for the Care Game Jam 2021. Credits :

Fr0oZzFred : Programmer, Game Design
Nedeleko : Programmer, Game Design
Alpaw : Programmer
Nibofar : Programmer
Rini : UI, Logo, site design
Mama-chan: UI

Music by Quebi licensed under creative commons.
